short_summary: Flooring Replacement at the Northwest Atlantic Fisheries Center in St. John’s, Newfoundland and Labrador
description: The scope of work for this project consists of the furnishing of all plant, labour, equipment and material required for the replacement of ceramic, resilient, and carpet tile flooring types at various locations throughout the NAFC in St. John’s, NL.  Delivery Date Required:  (18) weeks after award of contract
